message.name: DEFERRED_PROCESS_INFO_MESSAGE
message.locale: The selected cases are currently being reassigned and a notification will be sent to your Inbox once this completes.

message.name: DEFERRED_PROCESS_SUCCESS_MESSAGE
message.locale: Reassignment of cases from %1s to %2s completed successfully.

message.name: DEFERRED_PROCESS_FAILURE_MESSAGE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Reassignment of cases from %1s to %2s was unsuccessful.

message.name: DEFERRED_PROCESS_FAILURE_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION_1
message.locale: The following caused the reassignment to fail:

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_INFO_MESSAGE
message.locale: There are too many cases selected to reassign now. This reassignment will need to be performed in batch mode, please schedule with your administrator.

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_INDIVIDUAL_FAILURE_MESSAGE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Case %1s %2s for %3s was not reassigned from %4s to %5s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_INDIVIDUAL_FAILURE_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION_1
message.locale: The following caused the reassignment to fail:

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_SUBJECT
message.locale: Report from 'Bulk Case Reassignment' batch job run on %1s at %2s.

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_1
message.locale: Number of cases specified for reassignment: %1s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_2
message.locale: Number of cases successfully reassigned: %1s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_3
message.locale: Number of cases failed reassignment: %1s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_4
message.locale: Note: Notifications were sent to owners informing them of the failed reassignments.

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_5
message.locale: Number of invalid case reassignment: %1s

message.name: BATCH_PROCESS_SUMMARY_LINE_6
message.locale: Invalid case reassignment means attempting to reassign the case to the current case owner. This applies to the following cases: %1s.\nNote notifications were not sent to case owners for these invalid reassignments.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_CASE_QUEUED_FOR_LATER_REASSIGNMENT
message.locale: %1n Cases have been successfully queued for later reassignment.

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_CASE_REASSIGNMENT
message.locale: If more than %1n cases are selected, reassignment will happen offline (e.g. in deferred or batch process).

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_CASE_REASSIGNMENT_NOTIFICATION
message.locale: %1n cases were reassigned to you from %2s by %3s

message.name: INF_CASE_REASSIGNMENT_BATCH_OUTPUTFILEID
message.locale: CaseReassignmentBatch

message.name: ERR_CASE_ALREADY_QUEUED_FOR_REASSIGNMENT
message.locale: This case cannot be reassigned manually as it has already been queued for reassignment. The new case owner will be notified once reassignment completes.
